value.string: *****************************Create the template File which contains the input data****************************

value.expression: $m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Bot Started,IVR Validation process identifier Bot started successfully

value.string: *************************************If IVR Validation Template.csv file is not present create the file*************************************
RequestId,Policy Number,Process,New Phone Number, Submitted by, Email Address,Cancel Effective Date
************************************If the status of the json data is InDocQueue then find whether it belongs to cancellation type or phone number change type*************************************
************************************If Json Status in InDocQueue fetch the requst id and policy number*************************************
************************************Log request id,policy number,Cancellation in newly created template file*************************************
************************************If process type is cancellation,then fetch the requst id and policy number and new phone number*************************************
************************************Log request id,policy number,Phone number change,New Phone Number in newly created template file*************************************
